com.bukola

Class IncomeTax

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bukola.IncomeTax
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Taxable

    public class IncomeTax
extends java.lang.Object
implements Taxable
    Class for Income Tax calculations. All results are rounded up with BigDecimal RoundingMode.HALF_UP.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IncomeTax(java.math.BigDecimal personalTaxAllowance)
      Class constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void calculate(java.util.List<java.math.BigDecimal> profit)
      Calculates income tax due on each weekly earnings, normally 20% after personal allowance
      java.util.List<java.math.BigDecimal> getList()
      Returns a list view of all tax due for each week's earnings.
      java.math.BigDecimal getPersonalTaxAllowance()
      Returns tax allowance vale for the year entered during class initialization.
      java.math.BigDecimal getTotalToDate()
      Returns a running total of tax due to date.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • IncomeTax

        public IncomeTax(java.math.BigDecimal personalTaxAllowance)
        Class constructor.
        Parameters:
        personalTaxAllowance - this is the personal allowance for every tax payer before tax deductions. See www.gov.uk for current rate. This value cannot be zero.

        Returns tax allowance vale for the year entered during class initialization.

        public void calculate(java.util.List<java.math.BigDecimal> profit)
        Calculates income tax due on each weekly earnings, normally 20% after personal allowance
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        profit - this is taxable income after expenses.

      • getTotalToDate

        public java.math.BigDecimal getTotalToDate()
        Returns a running total of tax due to date. This can be used to compute the total annual tax after 52 weeks, using the tax calendar.
        Specified by:
        getTotalToDate in interface Taxable
        Returns:
        type BigDecimal.
